title: H0533 - House | for | Sale | Mt Lavinia
details:
DESCRIPTION
It is a four bed roomed spacious house situated in Mt Lavinia with an attached bathrooms, an elegant pantry with fitted cupboards.

LOCATION
House is located in a tranquil & peaceful highly residential & well secured convenient location 1st cross lane,Temples Road, Mt Lavinia & is situated with close proximity to supermarkets, leading International as well as local schools, also close to banks, hospitals, places of worship, the post office etc.etc, it is only about thirty minutes drive to the Colombo city center & close to most of the towns in & around Colombo & the suburbs, from this location.

FACILITIES
Parking : 2 Vehicles
Floor type : Tiled & wooden
Garden & small courtyard
Solar Hot water system
Roller-door gate and wooden gate
All Doors, windows and stairways done using solid teak wood
CCTV Camera
2 water tanks
Three phase electricity
Modern pantry cupboard with cooker set, oven
